actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to extend from six months to nine months the period for which the Veterans Administration may pay for certain nursing home care furnished to eligible veterans by private institutions.

summary.text: Extends to nine months (now six months) the period for which the Veterans' Administration may pay for certain nursing home care furnished by private institutions to eligible veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to extend from six months to nine months the period for which the Veterans Administration may pay for certain nursing home care furnished to eligible veterans by private institutions.
